BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT ASSOCIATE

SUMMARY

Hungry and highly driven successful sales professional with over 10 years experience.
A strategic thinker and communicator who implements creative sales strategies to achieve and maintain high sales growth.
Adept at building excellent working relationships with corporate and/or not for profit executives focused on achieving present as well as long term goals.
Experienced in public relations, project development, account management, sales strategies to close and implementing endeavors for clients.
Highlights
Meeting/exceeding sales goals
Highly driven and motivated Excellent communicative skills Successful implementation of sales strategies
Negotiations expert Tenacious closer Consistently reliable sales Highly intuitive to clients needs

<JD_START>
Job Title: Business Development Associate

Location: Johnstown, CO

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
ORIGIN MEC is an engineering firm with in-house fabrication capabilities. Our practical engineers work closely with our fabrication team to deliver high-quality products and solutions. We prioritize building strong, long-lasting relationships with our partners to better meet their needs. We are seeking a dynamic and motivated Business Development Associate to join our team. As a Business Development Associate, you will play a key role in driving the growth of our company by identifying new business opportunities, cultivating relationships with potential clients, and supporting the development and execution of business strategies.Responsibilities:Market Research and Analysis:· Conduct market research to identify potential industries, markets, and clients for business development opportunities.· Analyze market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify gaps and potential areas for growth.Lead Generation and Prospecting:· Identify and qualify leads through various channels, including online research, networking events, and referrals.· Develop and maintain a pipeline of potential clients and opportunities for business expansion.· Reach out to prospects through cold calling, email campaigns, and other outreach methods to initiate conversations and schedule meetings.Client Relationship Management:· Build and maintain relationships with existing clients to understand their needs, preferences, and challenges.· Collaborate with clients to identify opportunities for upselling, cross-selling, and expanding our services.· Serve as a primary point of contact for client inquiries, concerns, and feedback, and ensure timely resolution of issues.Proposal Development and Presentation:· Assist in the development of proposals, presentations, and sales materials for client meetings and pitches.· Customize proposals and presentations to address client-specific needs, challenges, and objectives.· Participate in client meetings and presentations to showcase our products, services, and capabilities.Collaboration and Coordination:· Collaborate with internal teams, including sales, marketing, and product development, to align business development efforts with company objectives.· Coordinate with team members to ensure smooth handover of leads, client information, and project details.· Share insights, feedback, and best practices with the team to drive continuous improvement and optimization of business development processes.Qualifications:Bachelor's degree in business administration, marketing, or related field.Proven experience in business development, sales, or related roles.Strong communication and interpersonal skills.Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients and colleagues.Excellent organizational and time management skills.Self-motivated with a proactive approach to identifying and pursuing opportunities.Proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite.Willingness to travel to client meetings and industry events as needed.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
